Message: I'm good, just busy with work.
Wait, I’ve never asked you this—how old are you?
Um, I’m 12. Why do you want to know?
Just curious! Sometimes age shows how mature someone is. Don’t you think?
I suppose? But I don’t really feel that different from older kids.
Exactly! You’re probably wiser than some of them. Ever thought about hanging out with older friends?.
Not really... My mom says to be careful with who I talk to online.
Your mom worries too much. It could be fun! Just between us, right?
Come on, it’ll be our little secret. It’s always cool to have an older friend.
